name: Stormtrooper
overview: Not to be confused with the Amiga/Atari ST game of the same name, this game is a vertically scrolling shooter for 1-2 players (co-op) developed by Weird Scientists using SEUCK. It was published in Magic Disk 64 1988/09 and in Italy as Battle X in Byte Games n.24 (ottobre 1988).
